{{Infobox battle item |name = Protein |image = [[File:Protein_Item.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Protein''. |price = As per the table below |location =
*[[Protein#Shops|Shops]] *[[Protein#Dungeons|Dungeons]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Battle Frontier]] }} '''Protein''' is a consumable item which can be purchased from each [[Regions|Region's]] League, or traded for [[Berries]] with the [[Berry Master]] of each region from [[Johto]] onwards. It can be fed to a Pokémon to increase the amount of attack that Pokémon gains by 1 per protein per hatch. Each Pokémon can consume a total of 5 proteins per unlocked region. ==How to Use== Go to Start Menu > Items > Item Bag, select the protein and select a Pokémon to use it on. Once used, the effect is permanent and cannot be removed by any means. ==New Efficiency== [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X5lBpoGCC6hc9ogzCEJGh87ecFCvLSJ1LqTe1FSiVKQ/edit?usp=sharing| Linked here is a Google Sheet] containing a calculator for the most efficient Pokémon to breed accounting for both the Regional Damage Debuff and Proteins. Breeding efficiency is determined by the following formula: \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Egg Cycles} = \frac{\text{Egg Steps}}{40} $} \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Breeding Efficiency} = \frac{0.25 \times \text{Base Attack} + \text{Proteins Used}}{\text{Egg Cycles}} $} ==Price== When bought from the Indigo Plateau / Pokémon League, the price for Protein rises irreversibly, similar to [[Pokéballs|Masterballs]]. It starts off at 10,000 {{pdollar}}, increments by a factor of 1.1 every purchase, and caps at 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} after 49 purchases. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Purchased !! Price {{pdollar}} |- | Base Price || 10,000 {{pdollar}} |- | After 5 || 16,105 {{pdollar}} |- | After 10 || 25,937 {{pdollar}} |- | After 15 || 41,772 {{pdollar}} |- | After 20 || 67,275 {{pdollar}} |- | After 25 || 108,347 {{pdollar}} |- | After 30 || 174,494 {{pdollar}} |- | After 35 || 281,024 {{pdollar}} |- | After 40 || 452,593 {{pdollar}} |- | After 45 || 728,905 {{pdollar}} |- | After 49 || 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |} ==Acquisition== ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Indigo Plateau Kanto]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Indigo Plateau Johto]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Pokémon League Hoenn]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Hearthome City]]|[[Berry Master|Berry Master Trade]]}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Pokémon League Sinnoh]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Pokémon League Unova]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Pokémon League Kalos]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Pokémon League Alola]]|See Above}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Galar: Locations & Items|Wyndon Stadium]]|See Above}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Cerulean Cave|Mythic|500 Clears}} {{LootItem|Team Rockets Hideout|Mythic|400 Clears}} {{LootItem|Ice Path|Mythic|450 Clears}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Mythic|450 Clears}} {{LootItem|Mt.
